did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.physdesc: Records (documents), correspondence, collective labor agreements, papers (documents).
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract:
Consists mostly of pamphlets, manuals, and reports from Pittsburgh Glass.
Handwritten notes, agendas, correspondence, address books, contracts, miscellaneous notes, sound discs

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: International Brotherhood of Teamsters, Chauffeurs, Stablemen, and Helpers of America
Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives
New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: Jesse Carpenter Collections #/4336. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
